attributes.title: How to help wildlife at school

field_action_summary.value: Whether feeding the birds, or sowing a wildflower patch, setting up wildlife areas in your school makes for happier, healthier and more creative children.
field_action_summary.processed: Whether feeding the birds, or sowing a wildflower patch, setting up wildlife areas in your school makes for happier, healthier and more creative children.

attributes.title: How to make a coastal garden

field_action_summary.value: Coastal gardening can be a challenge, but with the right plants in the right place, your garden and its wildlife visitors can thrive.
field_action_summary.processed: Coastal gardening can be a challenge, but with the right plants in the right place, your garden and its wildlife visitors can thrive.

attributes.title: How to make a woodland edge garden for wildlife

field_action_summary.value: Few of us can contemplate having a wood in our back gardens, but just a few metres is enough to establish this mini-habitat!
field_action_summary.processed: Few of us can contemplate having a wood in our back gardens, but just a few metres is enough to establish this mini-habitat!

attributes.title: How to provide bushes for nesting birds

field_action_summary.value: In the spring, birds choose the best locations to build nests, so why not offer them a safe place to settle?
field_action_summary.processed: In the spring, birds choose the best locations to build nests, so why not offer them a safe place to settle?

attributes.title: How to make a hedge for wildlife

field_action_summary.value: Hedges provide important shelter and protection for wildlife, particularly nesting birds and hibernating insects.
field_action_summary.processed: Hedges provide important shelter and protection for wildlife, particularly nesting birds and hibernating insects.

attributes.title: How to make a shrub garden for wildlife

field_action_summary.value: Woody shrubs and climbers provide food for wildlife, including berries, fruits, seeds, nuts leaves and nectar-rich flowers. So why not plant a shrub garden and see who comes to visit?
field_action_summary.processed: Woody shrubs and climbers provide food for wildlife, including berries, fruits, seeds, nuts leaves and nectar-rich flowers. So why not plant a shrub garden and see who comes to visit?

attributes.title: How to cut out palm oil – not trees

field_action_summary.value: Palm Oil is a cheap, efficient form of vegetable oil, but a lot of species-rich tropical habitat is being destroyed to make way for it.
field_action_summary.processed: Palm Oil is a cheap, efficient form of vegetable oil, but a lot of species-rich tropical habitat is being destroyed to make way for it.

attributes.title: How to plant a tree

field_action_summary.value: It might surprise you, but even the smallest of gardens can accommodate a tree!
field_action_summary.processed: It might surprise you, but even the smallest of gardens can accommodate a tree!

attributes.title: How to build a hedgehog home

field_action_summary.value: By providing safe places for hedgehogs to live, you’re much more likely to see these prickly creatures in your garden.
field_action_summary.processed: By providing safe places for hedgehogs to live, you’re much more likely to see these prickly creatures in your garden.

attributes.title: How to have a plastic- free Halloween

field_action_summary.value: Halloween is often a great time for spooky family fun, but unfortunately it is often full of plastic.
field_action_summary.processed: Halloween is often a great time for spooky family fun, but unfortunately it is often full of plastic.

attributes.title: Change how you travel

field_action_summary.value: Ten top tips for reducing your vehicle emissions.
field_action_summary.processed: Ten top tips for reducing your vehicle emissions.

attributes.title: How to use less plastic

field_action_summary.value: Plastic waste and its damaging effect on our seas and natural world has been big news recently. Here's what you can you do about it.
field_action_summary.processed: Plastic waste and its damaging effect on our seas and natural world has been big news recently. Here's what you can you do about it.

attributes.title: How to make a log shelter

field_action_summary.value: Log piles are perfect hiding places for insects, providing a convenient buffet for frog, birds, and hedgehogs too!
field_action_summary.processed: Log piles are perfect hiding places for insects, providing a convenient buffet for frog, birds, and hedgehogs too!

attributes.title: How to start a wildlife garden from scratch

field_action_summary.value: Use the blank canvas of your garden to make a home for wildlife.
field_action_summary.processed: Use the blank canvas of your garden to make a home for wildlife.

attributes.title: How to grow a wildlife- friendly vegetable garden

field_action_summary.value: Learn about companion planting, friendly pest control, organic repellents and how wildlife and growing vegetables can go hand in hand.
field_action_summary.processed: Learn about companion planting, friendly pest control, organic repellents and how wildlife and growing vegetables can go hand in hand.

attributes.title: How to create a hedgehog hole

field_action_summary.value: Help hedgehogs get around by making holes and access points in fences and barriers to link up the gardens in your neighbourhood.
field_action_summary.processed: Help hedgehogs get around by making holes and access points in fences and barriers to link up the gardens in your neighbourhood.

attributes.title: How to create a container garden for wildlife

field_action_summary.value: Pots and containers are a great way of introducing wildlife features onto patios, or outside the front door. They are also perfect for small gardens or spaces like window ledges or roofs. Herbs, in particular, make good container plants and attract lots of wildlife.
field_action_summary.processed: Pots and containers are a great way of introducing wildlife features onto patios, or outside the front door. They are also perfect for small gardens or spaces like window ledges or roofs. Herbs, in particular, make good container plants and attract lots of wildlife.

attributes.title: How to create a vertical garden

field_action_summary.value: Gardening doesn’t need to be restricted to the ground - bring your walls to life for wildlife! Many types of plants will thrive in a green wall, from herbs and fruit to grasses and ferns.
field_action_summary.processed: Gardening doesn’t need to be restricted to the ground - bring your walls to life for wildlife! Many types of plants will thrive in a green wall, from herbs and fruit to grasses and ferns.

attributes.title: How to make a bog garden

field_action_summary.value: Instead of draining, make the waterlogged or boggy bits of garden work for nature, and provide a valuable habitat.
field_action_summary.processed: Instead of draining, make the waterlogged or boggy bits of garden work for nature, and provide a valuable habitat.

attributes.title: How to have an eco-Christmas

field_action_summary.value: Whether you celebrate a big family Christmas, or you just give out a few cards to your friends and neighbours to wish them a happy time, here are some quick tips for a greener Christmas!
field_action_summary.processed: Whether you celebrate a big family Christmas, or you just give out a few cards to your friends and neighbours to wish them a happy time, here are some quick tips for a greener Christmas!

attributes.title: Change what you eat

field_action_summary.value: Buy local produce, eat more plant-based foods and reduce your food miles to shrink your environmental footprint.
field_action_summary.processed: Buy local produce, eat more plant-based foods and reduce your food miles to shrink your environmental footprint.

field_action_summary.value: Grow plants that help each other! Maximise your garden for you and for wildlife using this planting technique.
field_action_summary.processed: Grow plants that help each other! Maximise your garden for you and for wildlife using this planting technique.

attributes.title: Change your energy use

field_action_summary.value: Energy used in buildings accounts for around 17% of total emissions. Reducing your household energy use by switching to a renewable energy supplier or purchasing a heat pump will help cut down.

field_action_summary.processed: Surfaced spaces needn't exclude wildlife! Gravel can often be the most wildlife-friendly solution for a particular area.

attributes.title: How to make a Christmas wreath for birds

field_action_summary.value: With food, water and shelter scarce over the winter months, give your garden birds a treat with an edible Christmas wreath.

attributes.title: How to clean nestboxes and bird feeders

field_action_summary.value: Nestboxes can harbour parasites so it is good practice to take them down at the end of the season and give them a clean. Likewise it is important to keep bird feeders clean to stop the spread of diseases.
field_action_summary.processed: Nestboxes can harbour parasites so it is good practice to take them down at the end of the season and give them a clean. Likewise it is important to keep bird feeders clean to stop the spread of diseases.

attributes.title: Climate friendly gardening

field_action_summary.value: There are plenty of ways you can take action against climate change in your own backyard or local greenspace.
field_action_summary.processed: There are plenty of ways you can take action against climate change in your own backyard or local greenspace.

attributes.title: Recycle and reuse

field_action_summary.value: Recycle, upcycle - and make do and mend! Production of household waste needs to decrease by 33% by 2037 to reach emissions targets. So get out that needle and thread!
field_action_summary.processed: Recycle, upcycle - and make do and mend! Production of household waste needs to decrease by 33% by 2037 to reach emissions targets. So get out that needle and thread!

attributes.title: How to build a mini stone wall

field_action_summary.value: Caring for a pet is a rewarding experience that doesn't have to cost the earth.
field_action_summary.processed: Caring for a pet is a rewarding experience that doesn't have to cost the earth.

attributes.title: Smart souvenir shopping

field_action_summary.value: Bringing a piece of your holiday home is a great way of keeping the memories alive – just make sure it’s wildlife-friendly!
field_action_summary.processed: Bringing a piece of your holiday home is a great way of keeping the memories alive – just make sure it’s wildlife-friendly!

attributes.title: How to create a mini pond

field_action_summary.value: Even a small pond can be home to an interesting range of wildlife, including damsel and dragonflies, frogs and newts.
field_action_summary.processed: Even a small pond can be home to an interesting range of wildlife, including damsel and dragonflies, frogs and newts.

attributes.title: How to attract butterflies to your garden

field_action_summary.value: Provide food for caterpillars and choose nectar-rich plants for butterflies and you’ll have a colourful, fluttering display in your garden for many months.
field_action_summary.processed: Provide food for caterpillars and choose nectar-rich plants for butterflies and you’ll have a colourful, fluttering display in your garden for many months.

attributes.title: Grow wildlife-friendly herbs

field_action_summary.value: Planting herbs will attract important pollinators into your garden, which will, in turn, attract birds and small mammals looking for a meal.
field_action_summary.processed: Planting herbs will attract important pollinators into your garden, which will, in turn, attract birds and small mammals looking for a meal.

attributes.title: How to attract moths and bats to your garden

field_action_summary.value: Plant flowers that release their scent in the evening to attract moths and, ultimately, bats looking for an insect-meal into your garden.
field_action_summary.processed: Plant flowers that release their scent in the evening to attract moths and, ultimately, bats looking for an insect-meal into your garden.

attributes.title: Chemical-free organic gardening

field_action_summary.value: Go chemical-free in your garden to help wildlife! Here's how to prevent slugs and insects from eating your plants with wildlife-friendly methods.
field_action_summary.processed: Go chemical-free in your garden to help wildlife! Here's how to prevent slugs and insects from eating your plants with wildlife-friendly methods.

attributes.title: How to build a swift box

field_action_summary.value: Swifts like to leave their nests by dropping into the air from the entrance. This is why they often choose to set up camp in the eaves of buildings. If you have a wall that's at least five metres tall, with a clear flyway in front, then installing a swift box or brick onto your own home is a great idea!
field_action_summary.processed: Swifts like to leave their nests by dropping into the air from the entrance. This is why they often choose to set up camp in the eaves of buildings. If you have a wall that's at least five metres tall, with a clear flyway in front, then installing a swift box or brick onto your own home is a great idea!

attributes.title: How to install a water butt

field_action_summary.value: Water butts lower the risks of local flooding and will reduce water bills by conserving the water you already have. They're great for watering the garden, refilling the pond - or even washing the car!
field_action_summary.processed: Water butts lower the risks of local flooding and will reduce water bills by conserving the water you already have. They're great for watering the garden, refilling the pond - or even washing the car!

attributes.title: How to conserve water

field_action_summary.value: If we all do our part in saving precious water supplies, we can make a huge difference for the environment.

attributes.title: How to provide water for wildlife

field_action_summary.value: All animals need water to survive. By providing a water source in your garden, you can invite in a whole menagerie!
